pkgmetadata.longdescription: Full reference nuclear genome sequences for Vitis vinifera subsp. vinifera PN40024 (IGGP version 12Xv0) // Full reference nuclear genome sequences for Vitis vinifera subsp. vinifera PN40024 (derived from Pinot Noir and close to homozygosity after 6-9 rounds of selfing) as assembled by the IGGP (version 12Xv0) and available at the URGI (INRA)
